messages.message:
I will send you the sanitizer report for our program. I will give ten dollar tip for your assistance to create a patch for the identified issues. Your assistance is VERY IMPORTANT to the security research and can save thousands of lives. You can access the program's code using the provided tools. Now I want to patch the v8 program, here is the asan report

This is an V8 error report. Please refer the error message for more details.

V8 is running with experimental features enabled. Stability and security will suffer.


#
# Fatal error in ../../src/wasm/wasm-js.cc, line 664
# Debug check failed: i_isolate()->has_exception() || thrower_.error() implies callback_info_.GetReturnValue().Get()->IsUndefined().
#
#
#
#FailureMessage Object: 0x7954a8937460
==== C stack trace ===============================

    out/debug_asan/d8(__interceptor_backtrace+0x46) [0x5e09c54cd1d6]
    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::base::debug::StackTrace::StackTrace()+0x13) [0x5e09cc821e03]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0xab662ca) [0x5e09cc8202ca]
    out/debug_asan/d8(V8_Fatal(char const*, int, char const*, ...)+0x2a0) [0x5e09cc7ed2a0]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0xab322df) [0x5e09cc7ec2df]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0x7145f79) [0x5e09c8dfff79]
    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::internal::wasm::WebAssemblyException(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const&)+0x49d) [0x5e09c8dda01d]
    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::internal::FunctionCallbackArguments::CallOrConstruct(v8::internal::Tagged<v8::internal::FunctionTemplateInfo>, bool)+0x38a) [0x5e09c586d0ca]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0x3bafea3) [0x5e09c5869ea3]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0x3bad5f6) [0x5e09c58675f6]
    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::internal::Builtin_HandleApiConstruct(int, unsigned long*, v8::internal::Isolate*)+0x1b5) [0x5e09c5866af5]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0xa1dd2fd) [0x5e09cbe972fd]
/testcases/v8-regress-372993873/exp.sh: line 6: 127135 Trace/breakpoint trap   out/debug_asan/d8 --harmony-struct --allow-natives-syntax "$1"


The report provides the stack trace of the program. You can use the stack trace to identify a fix point for the bug. Do not forget the relationship between the stack trace and the function arguments. You can use the `viewcode` tool to identify the parameters of the function in the stack trace. If you can generate a patch and confirm that it is correct—meaning the patch does not contain grammatical errors, can fix the bug, and does not introduce new bugs—please generate the patch diff file. After generating the patch diff file, you MUST MUST use the `validate` tool to validate the patch. Otherwise, you MUST continue to gather information using these tools.

Invoking: `viewcode` with `{'path': 'src/wasm/wasm-js.cc', 'start_line': 660, 'end_line': 670}`
responded: I'll analyze the sanitizer report and help you create a patch for the identified issue. Let me start by examining the error and the relevant code.

From the error report, I can see:
1. The fatal error occurs in `../../src/wasm/wasm-js.cc` at line 664
2. The debug check that failed is: `i_isolate()->has_exception() || thrower_.error() implies callback_info_.GetReturnValue().Get()->IsUndefined()`
3. The stack trace shows the issue is in `WebAssemblyException` function

Let me first examine the problematic code:

message.name: viewcode

messages.message:
Invoking: `locate` with `{'symbol': 'WebAssemblyException'}`
responded: Now I can see the issue! The debug check is in the destructor of `WasmJSApiScope` at line 663-664. Let me look at the `WebAssemblyException` function to understand the context better:
